CarMax is the largest used car dealership chain in the US with over 100 dealerships and have sold over 5 million cars The Problem “Customers of CarMax are commonly undecided on the exact car they wish to purchase. Knowing what car type, make, model and options to select as the criteria for a buyer can be a confusing and a long and drawn out process. This often leads to potential customers leaving the dealership without buying a car and risk going elsewhere once their mind is more made up.

7. CarMax Vehicle Recommendation Tool • Excellent categorization of data, in a way that is easy to comprehend and intuitive • Does not engage the user • Too many options – is more of a search tool

8. • Allows the user to go through all options at a glance • Quick and easy to use • Simple and clean UI Buzz feed quiz

9. Kelley Blue Book app • Breakdown of information into multiple pages for easy viewing • Carousel slider allows the user to access the information at his own pace

10. • Swipe through the mandatory tutorial the first time you open the app • Status bar the bottom tracks progress through the tutorial Aurasma app

12. Tutorial Screen • Seen on first time opening the app only • 4 screens describing what the app does • User must complete the tutorial before entering the application

13. Social Media Link • Drop down interface • Prompted with email / password • Opt out option leads to manual search

14. Confirmation Page • Confirm preferences we determined from the users social pages • User can edit each selection by clicking the box • Next takes you to second page of preferences, similar to this

15. Manual Search • 8 Questions to mirror information gathered from social pages • User answers the question by selecting the box that best fits them • Question mark provides clarification on the question and option • Status bar lets user know how far along in the process they are

17. Confirmation Page • Confirm preferences we determined from the users social pages • User can edit each selection by clicking the box • Next takes you to second page of preferences, similar to this

18. Car Options • Shows 4 car options at a time based on preferences gathered. • User can select each box to learn more about the car • See more provides more options

19. Car Profile • Pertinent details • Carousel for multiple images • Expanded view for specifications • Chance to pursue OR save car

20. My Lot • ”My Basket” • Carousel for easy viewing • Communication icons • Chance to begin make offer flow

22. Make offer flow • Short bio on Sales rep at CarMax • Remote communication possibilities • Message center for double blind communication within the app with push notifications
